description:
Comfy like your favorite sandals. Waterproof like a good pair of boots. These light trail shoes are great all-rounders for a variety of conditions thanks to KEEN.DRY™ membranes that seal out puddles and mud.

  • Leather and synthetic uppers for a durable and secure fit
  • KEEN.DRY™ waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out
  • Gusseted tongue keeps out water and debris
  • Dual-density EVA insole adds cushioning
  • Dual-density, compression-moulded EVA midsole with torsion stability shank absorbs impacts and provides support
  • Non-marking carbon rubber outsoles with 4mm lugs grip whatever the trail throws at you
name: Keen Targhee III Low Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Men's
